home.title: Berkshire's {total} portfolio, tracked quarterly
kpi.portfolioSize.title: Total portfolio value
kpi.portfolioSize.description: Total value of reportable equities in Berkshire's 13F filing.
kpi.top1.title: Largest holding
kpi.top1.description: Changes in the largest position often drive overall concentration.
kpi.top10.title: Top10 concentration
kpi.top10.description: Higher Top10 share means more of the portfolio is in a few names.
charts.storyPortfolioHowToRead: Bar height = total 13F value in $B. Peak, trough, and latest quarters frame the story; hover for exact values.
charts.storyPortfolioFootnote: Peak and trough based on normalized 13F values. Latest: {latest_quarter}.
charts.portfolioHowToRead: Bar height = total 13F value in $B. Y-axis in billions (USD). Hover for exact value.
charts.portfolioEmptyHowToRead: Bar height shows total 13F portfolio value per quarter. Run the ingest pipeline to load data.
charts.portfolioEmptyFootnote: No data yet. Backend ingest will populate this.
charts.concentrationHowToRead: Stacked bar: share of portfolio in the top holdings. Higher = more concentrated.
charts.storyConcentrationHowToRead: Each bar shows what share of the portfolio sat in the top 1, top 5, and top 10 names that quarter, in % and $ terms.
charts.storyConcentrationFootnote: Top weights are recomputed from normalized 13F values; latest quarter uses today's rankings.
charts.concentrationLegendNote: Ranks and weights based on the latest quarter.
charts.growthRateHowToRead: Bar shows % change in total portfolio value vs previous quarter. Positive = portfolio grew.
charts.changesSummaryHowToRead: Count of holdings that were New, Increased, Decreased, or Closed vs prior quarter.
charts.storyActionsTitle: This quarter's moves: added {largest_buy_name}, trimmed {largest_sell_name}; {new_count} new and {exit_count} exits.
charts.storyActionsHowToRead: Left column lists the biggest adds, right column the biggest trims. Each row shows current weight/value and the change this quarter.
charts.storyActionsFootnote: Changes are computed quarter-over-quarter from normalized values. NEW/EXIT inferred from presence across consecutive quarters.
charts.compositionTitle: Top 5 holdings' share of portfolio over time
charts.compositionHowToRead: Stacked bar: each segment is one holding's weight %. Sum ≤ 100% per quarter.
download.title: Download center
download.intro: All artifacts: raw CSV, cleaned CSV, agg CSV, meta JSON. Each row shows quarter, generation time, and validation status.
download.noArtifacts: No artifacts yet. Run the backend ingest pipeline to generate files.
narrative.q1: Berkshire's reported 13F portfolio was ${total}B as of {quarter}.
narrative.q2: Concentration is shown in the Top1/Top5/Top10 chart below.
narrative.q3: Check the largest holding (often Apple) in the quarter detail and holding time series.
quarter.topHoldingsHowToRead: Bar length = position value. Label shows % of portfolio and $ amount.
holding.howToReadPct: Line shows % of total portfolio. Switch to $ for dollar value.
holding.howToReadUsd: Line shows position value in $B. Switch to % for weight.
explore.title: Full holdings this quarter
trust.title: Methodology and data quality
trust.point1: Units: we auto-detect whether 13F values are in USD or thousands and normalize to USD.
trust.point2: Weights: within each quarter we recompute weights from normalized values so they sum to ≈100%.
trust.point3: Traceability: each quarter records used_accessions so you can always click through to the SEC source.
